title: Low priority queue ban duration
body: I'm in the low priority queue (20min + queue + game) and i totally understand it because i have been toxic and leave few game but can i know for how long ? i already played like more than 5 game in low priority queue and there is no message to tell me for how many game i must wait like that

replies.body:
You can see how many LPQ's you have left after completing a match. It should list it in the post-game lobby for you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
